Name: DICOM Controlled Terminology Definitions
Title: null
Descriptino: DICOM Code Definitions (Coding Scheme Designator "DCM" Coding Scheme Version "01")

Name: TaskCode
Title: Task Codes
Descriptino: Codes indicating the type of action that is expected to be performed

Name: ActionCardinalityBehavior
Title: ActionCardinalityBehavior
Descriptino: Defines behavior for an action or a group for how many times that item may be repeated.

Name: ActionConditionKind
Title: ActionConditionKind
Descriptino: Defines the kinds of conditions that can appear on actions.

Name: ActionGroupingBehavior
Title: ActionGroupingBehavior
Descriptino: Defines organization behavior of a group.

Name: ActionPrecheckBehavior
Title: ActionPrecheckBehavior
Descriptino: Defines selection frequency behavior for an action or group.

Name: ActionRelationshipType
Title: ActionRelationshipType
Descriptino: Defines the types of relationships between actions.

Name: ActionRequiredBehavior
Title: ActionRequiredBehavior
Descriptino: Defines expectations around whether an action or action group is required.

Name: ActionSelectionBehavior
Title: ActionSelectionBehavior
Descriptino: Defines selection behavior of a group.

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Descriptino: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: RequestIntent
Title: RequestIntent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a request.

Name: RequestPriority
Title: RequestPriority
Descriptino: Identifies the level of importance to be assigned to actioning the request.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: TaskIntent
Title: TaskIntent
Descriptino: Distinguishes whether the task is a proposal, plan or full order.

Name: TaskStatus
Title: TaskStatus
Descriptino: The current status of the task.

Name: SNOMED_CT
Title: SNOMED CT (all versions)
Descriptino: SNOMED CT is the most comprehensive and precise clinical health terminology product in the world, owned and distributed around the world by The International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO).

Name: ActionType
Title: ActionType
Descriptino: The type of action to be performed.

Name: IdentifierType
Title: identifierType
Descriptino: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying type of identifier. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging data types CX, PLN, PPN, XCN and XON.

Name: ActReason
Title: ActReason
Descriptino: A set of codes specifying the motivation, cause, or rationale of an Act, when such rationale is not reasonably represented as an ActRelationship of type "has reason" linking to another Act.    *Examples:* Example reasons that might qualify for being coded in this field might be: "routine requirement", "infectious disease reporting requirement", "on patient request", "required by law".

Name: RoleCode
Title: RoleCode
Descriptino: A set of codes further specifying the kind of Role; specific classification codes for further qualifying RoleClass codes.

Name: HCParty
Title: BeCdHcParty
Descriptino: healthcare party in Belgium.

Name: BeCommunicationCode
Title: BeCommunicationCode
Descriptino: Communication codes in Belgium. To define a specific method of communicating. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

Name: BeCSCoPrescriberChoice
Title: BeCSCoPrescriberChoice
Descriptino: Type of intended performer choice

Name: BeTempRequestedService
Title: BeTempRequestedService
Descriptino: Temporary codes for indicating services that can be requested from a Nurse

Name: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
Title: BeTempRequestedServiceDetail
Descriptino: Temporary codes for indicating service details that can be requested from a Nurse

Name: BePrescriptionProposalType
Title: BePrescriptionProposalType
Descriptino: Prescription Proposal Type. Indicates the type of proposal (new or prolongation) as from the uses cases by NIHDI

Name: BePrescriptionStatusReason
Title: BePrescriptionStatusReason
Descriptino: Status reason for the prescription. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

Name: BeTreatmentStatusReason
Title: BeTreatmentStatusReason
Descriptino: Status reason for the treatment. Initially defined as supporting CodeSystem for the referral prescription.

Name: BeContrastFluidUse
Title: BeContrastFluidUse
Descriptino: Whether use of contrast fluid should be considered.

Name: Ietf3066
Title: Tags for the Identification of Languages
Descriptino: Older value from OID registry.  Superceded; see recommendations in BCP-47.
